about_the_game:
Two years after the outbreak of the new coronavirus, the virus has mutated. You will lead your team to face a group of zombies, intelligent robots and various mutant beasts. Laying the foundation for the survival and development of human beings, the optimized system can programmatically change the quality of the game and the player's gaming experience. It can also adjust the number of enemies, effects and sound effects according to the player's performance. "Human Or Virus" guarantees that every game will bring a satisfying, unique and challenging experience, in line with the players' respective game styles.

> More than 10 new weapons and items, let players get in touch with zombies.

> New survivors. New story. New dialogue.

> Various immersive battle maps.

> Dozens of infected people, let you experience the feeling of doom


联系地址 zbaklu530723633@gmail.com
本游戏由作者钟浩林独立开发拥有和运营

content_descriptors.notes: "Human Or Virus" has intense violence, bloodshed and gore scenes (including the beheading or dismemberment of zombie-like creatures) and some swear words.

detailed_description:
Two years after the outbreak of the new coronavirus, the virus has mutated. You will lead your team to face a group of zombies, intelligent robots and various mutant beasts. Laying the foundation for the survival and development of human beings, the optimized system can programmatically change the quality of the game and the player's gaming experience. It can also adjust the number of enemies, effects and sound effects according to the player's performance. "Human Or Virus" guarantees that every game will bring a satisfying, unique and challenging experience, in line with the players' respective game styles.

> More than 10 new weapons and items, let players get in touch with zombies.

> New survivors. New story. New dialogue.

> Various immersive battle maps.

> Dozens of infected people, let you experience the feeling of doom

name: Human Or Virus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 32/64-bit / Vista 32/64 / XP
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 128 MB, Shader model 2.0. ATI X800, NVidia 6600 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 32/64-bit / Vista 32/64 / XP
  • Processor: Intel core 2 duo 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card Shader model 3.0. NVidia 7600, ATI X1600 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

short_description: Two years after the outbreak of the new coronavirus, the virus has mutated. You will lead your team to face a group of zombies, intelligent robots and various mutant beasts. Laying the foundation for the survival and development of human beings
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
